contest-event.event-date:
Sept. 18, 1994 D Wychavon Contest (Second Section)
Wychavon Contest (Second Section) 20 Entertainments Contest Wychavon Festival of Brass wychavon-contest-2nd-section
Droitwich Spa High School, Droitwich Spa, Worcestershire, England, UK Best Soloist: Mark Smith (Sandwell) Information taken from contest programme, BBW 38, and British Bandsman 4797
In a report that otherwise lists the placing and points of every band that played in BBW 38, Bollington is not listed. A short article appears directly above (p.25) reporting the tragic death of their former conductor Brian Taylor while watching them at the contest. Are these two things related?
Feb. 12, 2012, 8:32 p.m. Oct. 17, 2014, 3:58 p.m.
1 United Co-op Crewe Youth Roy Sparkes
2 Avonbank (Evesham) Band Mike Caveney
3 Black Country Brass Band Cliff Parker
4 Barlestone Victoria Malcolm Crayton
Unknown Result Bollington Brass Robert Wyatt
Withdrawn Shipston Town Band Les Yarrow
